A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie experience is actually good! Nice effects and beautiful imagery... however it is a very bad Star Wars movie and therefor I only give it 1 star. I went to the cinema with a lot of expectations (because it is a Star Wars movie) and was let down and really disappointed. Even though I like the fact that Rian Johnson tries to subvert our expectations\, i think I would have liked one of the many theories more than I actually liked what he made.
